Class Main.RenderTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.Main.RenderTask
  • Enclosing class:
    Main

    public static class Main.RenderTask
extends java.lang.Object
    A render task represents a rectangular image region that is rendered by a thread in one chunk.
